title: [JIT][meta] Hybrid front-end operator-level robustness testing master task
body_html:
Tests: #8145

Results: https://gist.github.com/zdevito/6d62435b68edf027a98ed6c9d96ef3df

Unsupported ops:
Master #8527

(Note these issues are closed because they were taking up a lot of space on the issues page)

  • 10 tests 8507 Unsupported op descriptor index_fill
  • 10 tests 8497 Unsupported op descriptor index-{2,3,4}
  • 6 tests 8522 Unsupported op descriptor scatter
  • 6 tests 8521 Unsupported op descriptor scatter_add
  • 6 tests 8511 Unsupported op descriptor masked_fill
  • 6 tests 8506 Unsupported op descriptor index_copy
  • 6 tests 8505 Unsupported op descriptor index_add
  • 4 tests 8512 Unsupported op descriptor masked_scatter

Issues:

  • 21 tests 8499 Accumulation operator shape propagation broadcast failures
  • 15 tests 8393 Can't allocate zero gradients for a value without a type
  • 17 tests 8516 Better handle IntList arguments for ops like permute
  • 11 tests 8498 Expand number of sizes provided (0) must be greater or equal to the number of dimensions in the tensor (1)
  • 10 tests 8513 elementwise min/max attempting to create a Scalar from a 3 dim Tensor]
  • 5 tests 8526 expected ident but found 'where' here
  • 5 tests 8538 Missing check for non-method functions in operator-level tests
  • 5 tests 8528 Generalize variadic output logic for min, max and split
  • 4 tests 8502 Don't support None in the script
  • 4 tests 8500 addc{div,mul} type issues - scalar accumulation
  • 4 tests 8518 Don't support empty tuple literal
  • 3 tests 8525 split: expected a value of type Tensor for argument 'split_size' but found (LongTensor[], LongTensor[], LongTensor[])
  • 3 tests 8501 Don't support differentiation of aten::addmm in certain cases
  • 2 tests 8520 Don't support torch.Size() in the script
  • 2 tests (probably test issue) 8514 Elementwise min/max scalar tests fail with tuple comparison
  • 2 tests 8515 Don't support inf in the script
  • 1 test (test probably needs restructuring) 8510 Inverse test is singular
  • 1 test (test probably needs restructuring) 8504 gesv operator test needs re-examining

Related Issues:

  • 7504 literals don't interact well with gpu tensors
body_text:
Tests: #8145
Results: https://gist.github.com/zdevito/6d62435b68edf027a98ed6c9d96ef3df
Unsupported ops:
Master #8527
(Note these issues are closed because they were taking up a lot of space on the issues page)

 10 tests 8507 Unsupported op descriptor index_fill
 10 tests 8497 Unsupported op descriptor index-{2,3,4}
 6 tests 8522 Unsupported op descriptor scatter
 6 tests 8521 Unsupported op descriptor scatter_add
 6 tests 8511 Unsupported op descriptor masked_fill
 6 tests 8506 Unsupported op descriptor index_copy
 6 tests 8505 Unsupported op descriptor index_add
 4 tests 8512 Unsupported op descriptor masked_scatter

Issues:

 21 tests 8499 Accumulation operator shape propagation broadcast failures 
 15 tests 8393 Can't allocate zero gradients for a value without a type
 17 tests 8516 Better handle IntList arguments for ops like permute
 11 tests 8498 Expand number of sizes provided (0) must be greater or equal to the number of dimensions in the tensor (1)
 10 tests 8513 elementwise min/max attempting to create a Scalar from a 3 dim Tensor]
 5 tests 8526 expected ident but found 'where' here
 5 tests 8538 Missing check for non-method functions in operator-level tests
 5 tests 8528 Generalize variadic output logic for min, max and split
 4 tests 8502 Don't support None in the script
 4 tests 8500 addc{div,mul} type issues - scalar accumulation
 4 tests 8518 Don't support empty tuple literal
 3 tests 8525 split: expected a value of type Tensor for argument 'split_size' but found (LongTensor[], LongTensor[], LongTensor[])
 3 tests 8501 Don't support differentiation of aten::addmm in certain cases
 2 tests 8520 Don't support torch.Size() in the script
 2 tests (probably test issue) 8514 Elementwise min/max scalar tests fail with tuple comparison
 2 tests 8515 Don't support inf in the script
 1 test (test probably needs restructuring) 8510 Inverse test is singular
 1 test (test probably needs restructuring) 8504 gesv operator test needs re-examining

Related Issues:

 7504 literals don't interact well with gpu tensors
body:
Tests: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8145

Results: https://gist.github.com/zdevito/6d62435b68edf027a98ed6c9d96ef3df

Unsupported ops:
Master https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8527

(Note these issues are closed because they were taking up a lot of space on the issues page)
- [x] 10 tests [8507 Unsupported op descriptor index_fill](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8507)
- [x] 10 tests [8497 Unsupported op descriptor index-{2,3,4}](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8497)
- [x] 6 tests [8522 Unsupported op descriptor scatter](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8522)
- [x] 6 tests [8521 Unsupported op descriptor scatter_add](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8521)
- [x] 6 tests [8511 Unsupported op descriptor masked_fill](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8511)
- [x] 6 tests [8506 Unsupported op descriptor index_copy](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8506)
- [x] 6 tests [8505 Unsupported op descriptor index_add](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8505)
- [x] 4 tests [8512 Unsupported op descriptor masked_scatter](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8512)

Issues:

- [x] 21 tests [8499 Accumulation operator shape propagation broadcast failures ](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8499)
- [x] 15 tests [8393 Can't allocate zero gradients for a value without a type](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8393)
- [x] 17 tests [8516 Better handle IntList arguments for ops like permute](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8516)
- [x] 11 tests [8498 Expand number of sizes provided (0) must be greater or equal to the number of dimensions in the tensor (1)](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8498)
- [x] 10 tests [8513 elementwise min/max attempting to create a Scalar from a 3 dim Tensor](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8513)]
- [x] 5 tests [8526 expected ident but found 'where' here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8526)
- [x] 5 tests [8538 Missing check for non-method functions in operator-level tests](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8538)
- [x] 5 tests [8528 Generalize variadic output logic for min, max and split](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8528)
- [x] 4 tests [8502 Don't support None in the script](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8502)
- [x] 4 tests [8500 addc{div,mul} type issues - scalar accumulation](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8500)
- [x] 4 tests [8518 Don't support empty tuple literal](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8518)
- [x] 3 tests [8525 split: expected a value of type Tensor for argument 'split_size' but found (LongTensor[], LongTensor[], LongTensor[])](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8525)
- [x] 3 tests [8501 Don't support differentiation of aten::addmm in certain cases](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8501)
- [x] 2 tests [8520 Don't support torch.Size() in the script](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8520)
- [x] 2 tests (probably test issue) [8514 Elementwise min/max scalar tests fail with tuple comparison](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8514)
- [x] 2 tests [8515 Don't support inf in the script](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8515)
- [x] 1 test (test probably needs restructuring) [8510 Inverse test is singular](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8510)
- [x] 1 test (test probably needs restructuring) [8504 gesv operator test needs re-examining](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8504)


Related Issues:
- [x] [7504 literals don't interact well with gpu tensors](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7504)
